content: Hi, I want to update my shipping address for quote 123456.

You are updating the shipping address for quote 123456. To assist you, I'll need to update the quote information with the new details. Please provide me with the details you'd like to change, such as the country, city, street, door number, postal code, or state.
The new address is S Western Ave, 201B, Los Angeles, CA, USA, 987654.

I just want to make sure everything is correct before I update the quote information. You provided a quote ID of 123456 and the new address as S Western Ave, 201B, Los Angeles, CA, USA, 98765. Is this correct?
Yes, that's correct. Also, can you tell me when my order will arrive?

I can only assist with updating quote information. I'm unable to help with information regarding the arrival time of your order. If you have any other questions about your quote, I'll be happy to help with that.
